experience.title: Global Key Account Manager
experience.description: Sales performance with current clients increased by 20% following the implementation 6-month account executive exchange programs to company locations abroad. Secured global RFP bids for clients totaling ten years and $800 a million in transaction revenue over contract terms. Managed a national team of five Account Managers and twenty account executives. Consistently exceeded annual sales goals during work tenure. Organized committees responsible for pre-sales and after sales service. Brought significant growth of 16% in after market sales through creation and implementation of strategic sales and marketing plans as well as talent management pipelines. Conceptualized and implemented national accounts programs to increase brand visibility. Responsible for monitoring pre- and post-sales quality standards to ensure service excellence across the client territories.

experience.title: Regional Account Manager
experience.description: Cultivated over $550,000 in recurring account sales within 18 months. Exceeded target growth prospects by 28% via continuous interaction with client stakeholders, to facilitate opportunity surveys. Performed Post-Sales activities: Captured intelligence data of client business needs, and competition products used to investigate cross-selling and upselling strategies customized for each client group. Successfully oversaw all projects for current engagement by monitoring commitments concerning quality, effort, cost, and schedule. Held a Zero complaint and escalation track record.

experience.title: Account Manager
experience.description: Increased total revenue an average of 12% annually by upselling activities. Managed $6 million in annual sales with recurring clients and held with complete P&L accountability for fourteen counties in Texas. Drove brand management strategies yielding 12+% annual growth of supplementary products to key accounts. Recovered $1 million in inactive accounts by initiating customer Q&A meetings, demonstrations, and online client education and training webinars. Expanded company service offering to affiliate stores of six main key accounts which doubled client spent turnover. Decreased transportation costs by securing service level agreements with local transport providers. Conducted client interviews for testimonial and referral purposes.
